title: Ugliest champion in the game?
body:
So right now, who would you say is the ugliest champion in the game (model wise), and in the most desperate need of a VGU?

I nominate {{champion:36}} 
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/6b/Dr._Mundo_Render.png/revision/latest?cb=20150720023350

Let's just take a moment to look at this sad, sad model.

 * The face and eyes in general look completely plastered on like a bad figurine from the dollar store.
 * Wonky proportions. One arm looks bigger than the other, giant elephant feet, legs too small, torso could not support that upper body.
 * **HIS TONGUE COLOR DOES NOT MATCH THE ART COLOR**
 * Hair looks like a giant spiky pit.
 * Why does he have 3 toes on each foot but 5 fingers on each hand?
 * His animations, likewise, are pretty bad. 

Mundo does look like he could fit in pretty nicely in an old PS1 game like Spyro: The Dragon
http://cdn1us.denofgeek.com/sites/denofgeekus/files/styles/main_wide/public/2017/08/spyro.jpg?itok=PSU2lbw3

 All too often I think we give Mundo a pass because he's iconic and a lot of people really like his old model. *That does not excuse the shape he is in, however!*

A VGU on this guy would be epic, though his kit is strange and probably outdated I don't think he needs a total rework like Sion but improving his animations and model would go a long way.

They already said that he's one of the champs that is most definitely in need of a rework, and is thus a champ they'll be tackling at some point in the future. However, this stuff takes time. Like Eve, Urgot, Swain, Yorick, Poppy, etc, they need to fix up just about everything about the guy. From the new VOs, the model, the old vs new abilities, gameplay + strats in and out of lane, the skin splashes, in-game skins with separate particle effects, etc., there's a lot they have to do and make sure that it'll be satisfactory with the player base. And if just one of those things isn't quite there yet, then they can't go through with releasing it just yet.
Udyr will unlikely to receive a model update in the next three years, because SGU is just what he should look like, and Riot haven't addressed that.
